ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: when He created you by successive stages?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Knowing that He has created you by various stages?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: when He has created you in stages?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who has created you in several stages?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: ‘Whereas it is He Who created you in different stages?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: While He has created you (in) Atwar (stages).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And indeed He has created you through various grades:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: seeing He created you by stages?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When He created you by (divers) stages?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: when He has created you through different stages of existence?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And surely He hath created you by stages.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: though He has created you in [various] stages?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Seeing that it is He that has created you in diverse stages?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: While He has created you in (different) stages [i.e. first Nutfah, then 'Alaqah and then Mudghah, see (VV. 23:13, 14) the Quran].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He has created you by stages!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Although He created you in stages.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: While He has created you in stages?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [71:14] when verily He created you in stages? (atwār is the plural of tūr, which means a state). Thus the sperm-drop is one state, the blood clot is another state, and so on, until the creation of the human being is complete: reflecting on [the manner of] his creation necessarily leads to belief in his Creator.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (When He created you by (diverse) stages?) The stages refer to sperm drops, blood clots, small chunks of flesh and bones, etc.,
